item.title: The Apache Way â€“ My First ApacheCon Experience
item.description: Apache CommunityOverCode Asia My journey into the world of open source began with a leap of faith, a ticket to my first ApacheCon, and a heart filled with excitement and curiosity. As I stepped into the vibrant conference hall, I was immediately struck by the energy and passion radiating from every corner. The Apache Way was more than just a philosophy; it was a living, breathing community of dedicated individuals united by a common belief in the power of collaboration and innovation.
